title: Vegan Tofu 'Fish' Sandwich
ingredients: ['100g (4 oz) breadcrumbs', '1 teaspoon kelp powder', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1/4 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon salt', '350g (12 oz) firm tofu - drained, pat dry and cut into 4 slices', 'olive oil, as needed', 'Tartar Sauce', '100g (4 oz) vegan mayonnaise', '5 cornichons, chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '4 wholemeal hamburger baps, split']
